article_title: Norway Central Bank Governor Expected Krone Drop
article_text:
OSLO—Norway's central bank knew that it would shake up its currency Thursday.

"We expected the krone to weaken immediately after we had published our rate path," said central bank governor Øystein Olsen in an interview after the announcement. "We thought, with good reason I think, that we surprised slightly on the downside compared with market expectations."

The euro shot almost 2% higher against the krone,...

twitter.description: Norway's central bank knew that it would shake up its currency by saying rates would stay low through the end of next year. The krone dropped 2% after the announcement.
twitter.title: Norway Central Bank Governor Expected Krone Drop

image.alt: Norway central bank governor expected krone drop after statement on rates staying low
